html:
Sales Invoice
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.customer}}
{{doc.posting_date}}
{{doc.due_date}}
{% for item in doc.items %} {%endfor%}
Sr Item Description Quantity Rate Amount
{{item.idx}}
{{item.item_code}}
{{item.description}}
{{item.qty}}
{{item.rate}} {{doc.currency}}
{{item.amount}} {{doc.currency}}
{{doc.total_qty}}
{{doc.total}} {{doc.currency}}
{{doc.posa_delivery_charges_rate}} {{doc.currency}}
{{doc.grand_total}} {{doc.currency}}
{{doc.rounded_total}} {{doc.currency}}
{{doc.in_words}}
{% if doc.custom_is_paid %} Yes {% else %} No {% endif %}
{% if doc.custom_is_paid %}
{{doc.custom_cash_bank_account}}
{{doc.custom_paid_amount}} {{doc.currency}}
{% endif %}
{% if doc.is_pos %} Yes {% else %} No {% endif %}
{% if doc.is_pos %} {% if doc.cash_bank_account %}
{{doc.cash_bank_account}}
{% endif %}
{{doc.paid_amount}} {{doc.currency}}
{% endif %}
{% set docs = frappe.db.get_all("Sales Invoice", {"customer": doc.customer, "docstatus": 1, "outstanding_amount": (">", 0)}, ["outstanding_amount"]) %} {% set total_outstanding_amount = namespace(value=0) %} {% for doc in docs %} {% set total_outstanding_amount.value = total_outstanding_amount.value + doc.outstanding_amount %} {% endfor %} {{total_outstanding_amount.value}} {{doc.currency}}
name: Sales Invoice with Payment
